name: Jira published in Kafka
description:
1. Triggers when a Contact is created / updated in Salesforce
2. Publishes a Message on a specific Kafka topic containing Contact details, according to Salesforce_contact common data model

block.name: publish_to_topic

extended_input_schema.hint:
Message key, to be stored with the message.
                   A key can be used by Kafka for selecting an appropriate topic partition
                   (when partition is not assigned explicitly). Only string keys are supported.
extended_input_schema.label: Key
extended_input_schema.name: key

extended_input_schema.hint:
You can explicitly publish message to the specific topic partition
                    (index starts from 0). Otherwise Kafka will select partition automatically.
extended_input_schema.label: Partition
extended_input_schema.name: partition

block.comment: Will publish a message in Kafka following the salesforce_contact common data model using the Salesforce trigger datapills

block.name: insert_row
block.title: Insert row in public.workatoopa
block.description: Insert row in public.workatoopa table in PostgreSQL
